NewsNow's New Format

  • From 2021

Share

Send email

Summary

NewsNow is a news aggregation platform with a lot of unique characteristics. Launched in 1996, the platform has undergone constant development in its over-25-year history. The business is fundamentally driven by two core disciplines; editorial and engineering, and thus while the platform is functionally impressive and extremely useful, it was in much need of a design overhaul.
